name: StarBox 63
description:
StarBox 63 Story

The year is 2134, Delton Corp has just released their latest line of super drones. Though thoroughly tested, an unforeseen bug has caused the drones to become sentient.

These drones have targeted our satellites and are en route to disable
them. 

With no other options the world military has called on you, Box McCloud,
to take down the super drones and save the planet.

You don't have to destroy all of them, just enough to disrupt their neural net. Are you up to the task?

Controls

Move = Arrow or W, A, S, D keys

Shoot = Spacebar

Point value per drone increases as game progresses.

Message from the developer

This is my first time participating in a game jam. I hope you enjoy!
